name: Spooky Tricker
description:
Tap the screen to leap from pumpkin to pumpkin to catch the candy treats. Beware of the haunted pumpkins for they have a trick up their sleeves, they turn into jack-o-lanterns, burst into flames and you lose a life.

Keep your balance, avoid the burning jack-o-lanterns and collect those candy treats! All your friends are relying on you to collect as much candy as possible, so that the Magic Halloween Bonfire Party is full of candy treats!

Select one of five fun characters to travel through the spooky graveyard, collecting candy.
Five characters: Ben Bones, Victor Vlad, Penny Poe, Betty Boo, Winnie Witch.

Game Features:

- One-touch control. Smooth and easy game play.
- Playable in landscape or portrait mode.
- Awesome Graphics and Effects.
- Festive Halloween audio.
- Five fantastic spooky characters to choose from
- Game Center integration.

Follow us on Twitter: @sungiftgames

Thanks for playing and enjoy!
